articles.author: Valentin Khorounzhiy
articles.title: Honda announces 'off-sequence' MotoGP contract for Marini - The Race
articles.description: Honda has officially named its replacement for six-time MotoGP champion Marc Marquez, picking out Luca Marini from the VR46 Ducati squad
articles.content:
Honda has officially named its replacement for six-time MotoGP champion Marc Marquez, picking out Luca Marini from the VR46 Ducati squad.
Marini joining Honda in place of the Gresini Ducati-bound Ma… [+1744 chars]
